EOSLuaStackRestorer Class Reference

This class is used to keep Lua stack always in a consistent state (based on code from Richard Shephard, published on CodeProject website: http://www.codeproject.com/cpp/luaincpp.asp). More...

#include <EOSLuaStackRestorer.h>

lua_State * luaState
int stackTop

Detailed Description

This class is used to keep Lua stack always in a consistent state (based on code from Richard Shephard, published on CodeProject website: http://www.codeproject.com/cpp/luaincpp.asp).
